thread.title: ‘The Fix is In’: CNN’s Jim Acosta on Trump Only Calling Conservative Outlets at Presser
thread.title_full: ‘The Fix is In’: CNN’s Jim Acosta on Trump Only Calling Conservative Outlets at Presser

author: Justin Baragona
title: ‘The Fix is In’: CNN’s Jim Acosta on Trump Only Calling Conservative Outlets at Presser
text:
‘The Fix is In’: CNN’s Jim Acosta on Trump Only Calling Conservative Outlets at Presser by Justin Baragona   President Donald Trump’s joint news   CNN correspondent Jim Acosta commented on a very specific aspect of the presser. He took that opportunity to highlight a trend that has been noticed in Trump press conferences. 
Acosta first pointed out that he attempted to yell out a question after Trump was done to no avail. He then noted that the questions he did take were from conservative outlets, perhaps in an effort to avoid receiving critical questions. 
“In the last three news conferences, [CNN anchor] Wolf [Blitzer],” Acosta stated. “All of the questions to the American news media have been handled by conservative press, and I think, Wolf, there’s no other way to describe it but the fix is in.” 
He continued, “This White House, this president, does not want to answer questions, critical questions, about his associates, his aides’ contacts   course of that campaign just as his National Security Adviser is being run out of this White House on a rail.” 
Watch the clip above, via CNN. 
[image via screengrab]
